definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: When they tighten their belts, austerity ripples out and chokes growth.
sentences.chinese: 當他們束緊褲腰帶，簡樸生活會波及到經濟增長。

sentences.english: How many children do they want to be affected?
sentences.chinese: 他們想要有多少孩子被波及？

sentences.english: Nonetheless he recognizes how far Heidegger’s ideas have spilled into the larger culture.
sentences.chinese: 不過他承認海德格爾思想已經波及到更大的文化。

sentences.english: One is the breadth of the discontent in the country.
sentences.chinese: 原因之一就是在美國國內這種不滿所波及到的範圍。

sentences.english: The core concern of input-output analysis is ripple effect.
sentences.chinese: 波及效應是投入產出分析的核心問題。

sentences.english: It elevates the levels of everyone it comes in contact with.
sentences.chinese: 它所波及到的每一個人水平都被提升。

sentences.english: The impact of the term Anthropocene has already been felt outside the scientific community.
sentences.chinese: 人類世的影響已經波及到了科學界以外的領域。

sentences.english: The crisis, however, has turned out to be much broader than anything I could have imagined.
sentences.chinese: 然而這場危機波及面之廣遠超我的想象。

sentences.english: It ripples out，moreover，to the heartstrings that will tug， And always leaves an echo that is very like a hug.
sentences.chinese: 它的漣漪深深波及心絃，總會留下反響，宛若擁抱。

sentences.english: This resulted in the creation of a rippled pattern along the length of the knife.
sentences.chinese: 這導致了刀創造了一個模式波及長度沿。

sentences.english: The voltage and current waveforms and spectrums at source and load end of a transmission line.
sentences.chinese: 傳輸線輸入端與負載端電壓及電流之脈波及頻譜。

sentences.english: Affect when haemorrhage when two side, appear two flank paralysis and limb atony the gender breaks down.
sentences.chinese: 當出血波及兩側時，出現兩側面癱和四肢弛緩性癱瘓。

sentences.english: Second, extraterritorial incursions and spread risk.
sentences.chinese: 二是域外風險的侵入和波及。

sentences.english: On the source, the GREater the damage, but also affected the scope of the smaller, and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 震源越淺，破壞越大，但波及範圍也越小，反之亦然。

sentences.english: Instability has spread to a number of previously benign provinces.
sentences.chinese: 動亂已經波及了以前和平安寧的省分。

definition: to inflict heavy losses/to inflict serious damage
to be drawn into/to be involved in
to engulf/to sweep/to carry away everything
to endanger/to jeopardize/a danger (to life, national security etc)
